remoteClasses.name: Dispatcher
remoteClasses.doc: A :rom:cls:`Hub` that allows routing between arbitrary port pairs

constructor.doc: Create a :rom:cls:`Dispatcher` belonging to the given pipeline.

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the dispatcher belongs

methods.name: connect
methods.doc: Connects each corresponding :rom:enum:`MediaType` of the given source port with the sink port.
